source:
plt.hist(df['date_diff'], bins=35, range=(0,35))
plt.title('Histogram of Landsat9 Revisit Periods')
plt.xlabel('Days')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.savefig('revisit_histogram.png')
plt.show()

plt.scatter(df['Date'], df['date_diff'])
plt.title('Time Series of Landsat9 Revisit Periods')
plt.xlabel('Date')
plt.ylabel('Days')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.savefig('revisit_timeseries.png')
plt.show()
